Structs/API.html#/s:24RestauranteUnivers.name: base_url
Structs/API.html#/s:24RestauranteUnivers.abstract: The base API URL to which the routes will be added

Structs/API.html#/s:24RestauranteUnivers.name: checkToken(success:failure:)
Structs/API.html#/s:24RestauranteUnivers.abstract: This method makes a HTTP request to the API to check if the JWT token saved in the device (if there is any) is a valid token. Route: GET /status/token.

Structs/API.html#/s:24RestauranteUnivers.name: getToken(success:failure:)
Structs/API.html#/s:24RestauranteUnivers.abstract: This method makes an HTTP request to the API to ask for a new JWT token. Route: POST clients/token

Structs/API.html#/s:24RestauranteUnivers.name: updateStatus(newStatus:ticket:success:failure:)
Structs/API.html#/s:24RestauranteUnivers.abstract: This method makes an HTTP request to the API to update a ticket in a queue. Route: PUT queues/:queue_id/tickets/:user_id

Structs/API.html#/s:24RestauranteUnivers.name: allocateTicket(params:success:failure:)
Structs/API.html#/s:24RestauranteUnivers.abstract: This method makes an HTTP request to the API to allocate a ticket in a queue. Route: POST queues/:queue_id

Structs/API.html#/s:24RestauranteUnivers.name: searchTicket(attendance:ticket:success:failure:)
Structs/API.html#/s:24RestauranteUnivers.abstract: This method makes an HTTP request to the API to search for a ticket in a queue. Route: GET queues/:queue_id/tickets/:user_id

Structs/AppUtility.html#/s:24Restaurante.name: hexStringToUIColor(hex:)
Structs/AppUtility.html#/s:24Restaurante.abstract: Convert an hexadecimal string to an UIColor object.

Structs/AppUtility.html#/s:24Restaurante.name: generateQRCode(from:)
Structs/AppUtility.html#/s:24Restaurante.abstract: This method encodes a string to a QRCode image.

Structs/AppUtility.html#/s:24Restaurante.name: saveIdentity(_:_:)
Structs/AppUtility.html#/s:24Restaurante.abstract: This method saves the identity value typed in a given text field, if a given switch is on

Structs/AppUtility.html#/s:24Restaurante.name: switchChangeListener(_:_:)
Structs/AppUtility.html#/s:24Restaurante.abstract: This method adds a listener to the switch which gives to the user the option to save the identity value typed in a given text field

Structs/AppUtility.html#/s:24Restaurante.name: retrieveIdentity(_:_:)
Structs/AppUtility.html#/s:24Restaurante.abstract: This method retrieves the identity saved in the device and puts it in the textField, it also sets the given switch to on if there are any identity saved or to off otherwise

Structs/AppUtility.html#/s:24Restaurante.name: modifySwitchAppearance(_:)
Structs/AppUtility.html#/s:24Restaurante.abstract: This method modifies the appearance of the switch buttons to a color that suits better the app and to a smaller sizer

Structs/AppUtility.html#/s:24Restaurante.name: resizeImage(image:targetSize:)
Structs/AppUtility.html#/s:24Restaurante.abstract: This method resizes an UIImage to another UIImage of a given size keeping the aspect ratio.

Structs/AppUtility.html.name: AppUtility
Structs/AppUtility.html.abstract: This struct provides utilities for the application that might be used by other classes and structs.

Structs/API.html.name: API
Structs/API.html.abstract: This struct is responsible for making the calls to the RU API. Each method represents a different route of the API and the interfaces allow the callbacks.
